translations.original_text: Hello, welcome to our AWS Translation Service!
translations.translated_text: Hola, ¡bienvenido a nuestro servicio de traducción de AWS!

translations.original_text: This service can translate text from English to Spanish and many other languages.
translations.translated_text: Este servicio puede traducir texto del inglés al español y a muchos otros idiomas.

translations.original_text: We use AWS Translate, which provides fast and accurate machine translation.
translations.translated_text: Usamos AWS Translate, que proporciona una traducción automática rápida y precisa.

translations.original_text: The infrastructure is built using Terraform for Infrastructure as Code.
translations.translated_text: La infraestructura se construye utilizando Terraform for Infrastructure as Code.

translations.original_text: Files are processed automatically when uploaded to the S3 request bucket.
translations.translated_text: Los archivos se procesan automáticamente cuando se cargan en el bucket de solicitudes de S3.

texts.text: Hello, welcome to our AWS Translation Service!
This service can translate text from English to Spanish and many other languages.
We use AWS Translate, which provides fast and accurate machine translation.
The infrastructure is built using Terraform for Infrastructure as Code.
Files are processed automatically when uploaded to the S3 request bucket.
